help.title: Help
help.intro: ScoreVault helps you track individual gymnast scores, view performance analytics, and monitor team progress over time. Whether tracking one athlete or managing a whole team, tap any question below to learn more.
help.contactSupport: If you have questions not covered here, please reach out through Settings → Contact Support.
help.q1: How do I add a gymnast?
help.a1: Tap the '+' button on the Gymnasts tab. Enter their name, level, discipline, and other optional information. You can also add a photo.
help.a2: First, create a meet in the Meets tab. Then from the meet, tap '+' to add scores for each gymnast who competed.
help.q3: Can I edit scores after adding them?
help.a3: Yes. Tap any score to edit or delete it.
help.q4: What does 'All Levels' mean on a gymnast's profile?
help.a4: It shows all scores for that gymnast, even from previous levels. This is useful for seeing progress over time.
help.a5: Team scores are calculated automatically by adding the best scores (top 3 or top 5) for each event. Teams are organized by level and discipline.
help.q6: Can I change a gymnast's level?
help.a6: Yes. Tap the level on their profile to update it. Past scores will keep their original levels.
help.a7: It's the highest score a gymnast has achieved on each event. It's shown in their analytics section.
help.q8: How do I hide a gymnast without deleting them?
help.a8: On the gymnast's profile, tap the eye icon. You can restore them from Settings → Hidden Gymnasts.
help.a9: Yes. Go to Settings → Export Data. You can export in JSON or CSV format for spreadsheets.
help.q10: What's the difference between Women's Artistic and Men's Artistic?
help.a10: They have different events and score ranges. Women's: Vault, Bars, Beam, Floor (0-10). Men's: Floor, Pommel Horse, Rings, Vault, Parallel Bars, High Bar (0-15).
help.q11: How do I delete a meet?
help.a11: Tap the meet, then tap the trash icon. This will also delete all associated scores.
help.q12: Can I add photos to gymnast profiles?
help.a12: Yes. When creating or editing a gymnast, tap 'Add Photo' to select one from your gallery.
help.q13: What does the Analytics section show?
help.a13: It shows event averages, personal records, score trends over time, and performance analysis.
help.a14: Yes. ScoreVault automatically creates teams based on your gymnasts' level and discipline. You can view all teams in the Teams tab.
help.q15: How do I switch between light and dark mode?
help.a15: Go to Settings → Appearance and select Light Mode, Dark Mode, or System Default.
help.a16: Placements show where a gymnast placed in each event (1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc.). They're optional when adding scores.
help.a17: Yes. Go to Settings → Language and select between English and Spanish.
help.a18: Tap the share icon on any score to create a shareable card. Customize the background, format, and style before sharing.
help.a19: All data is stored locally on your device. You can optionally enable cloud backup for additional security.
help.q20: Can I track gymnasts at different levels?
help.a20: Yes. You can add gymnasts at any level (1-10, Xcel, Elite) and the app will track them all automatically.
help.q21: How do I view progress over time?
help.a21: Each gymnast's profile shows trend charts that visualize their progress across all events over multiple meets.

welcome.title: Welcome to ScoreVault!
welcome.text: Your complete gymnastics scoring companion. Track scores, view analytics, and monitor team progress. Let's take a quick tour to get you started!

gymnastsTab.title: The Gymnasts Tab
gymnastsTab.text: This is the Gymnasts tab where you'll manage all your athlete profiles. View all your gymnasts, their levels, and recent scores at a glance.

addGymnast.title: Add Your First Gymnast
addGymnast.text: You can add gymnasts using the + button at the bottom right of the Gymnasts screen. Include their name, level, and discipline. You can add more details like photos and USAG numbers later.

meetsTab.title: The Meets Tab
meetsTab.text: Create meets to organize competitions. Each meet tracks scores for all gymnasts who competed. You can view results by meet or by gymnast.

addScore.title: Record Scores
addScore.text: Add scores for each event after a competition. The app automatically calculates all-around scores and tracks personal records!

teamsTab.title: The Teams Tab
teamsTab.text: Team scores are automatically calculated from your gymnasts' scores! View them organized by level and discipline. Tap any meet to add team placements.

socialCards.title: Share Achievements
socialCards.text: Tap any gymnast to view their scores. On each score card, you'll find a 'Create Social Card' button. Use it to make beautiful shareable graphics for social media!

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.text: You're ready to start tracking scores! You can replay this tutorial anytime from Settings → Help. Enjoy using ScoreVault!
